reward += max(0, 1 - distance_to_cube / 0.1)  # Reward for being close to the cube
reward += max(0, 1 - abs(height_diff) / 0.2)  # Reward for lifting the cube
reward += 0.5  # Reward for keeping the cube static
reward += max(0, 1 - distance_to_cubeA / 0.1)  # Reward based on proximity
reward += max(0, 1 - height_diff / 0.2)  # Reward based on height difference
reward += 1.0  # Reward for keeping cube A static
reward += max(0, 1.0 - 5.0 * dist_to_cube)  # Reward decreases with distance
reward += 2.0  # Large reward for successful grasp
reward += max(0, 1.0 - 10.0 * abs(height_diff))  # Reward decreases with height difference
reward += max(0, 1.0 - distance_to_cube) * 0.5  # Encourage getting closer to the cube
reward += max(0, 1.0 - height_diff) * 0.5  # Encourage lifting to the desired height
reward += 1.0  # Reward for keeping the cube static after lifting
reward += 1.0 / (1.0 + abs(height_diff))  # Inverse height difference reward
reward += 1.0  # Bonus for keeping the cube static
